name: KuGou Temporary Cache File
summary: A KGTEMP file is a temporary cache file created by KuGou, a popular Chinese music application. It is the same as an .MP3 file but named using an md5 algorithm. KGTEMP files are used to store information about recently played MP3 songs so it can be quickly accessed by the KuGou app at a later time.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
